modules

Interface Module

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbcCreator, FileEditor, Main, SongbookUpdater, VersionControl

    public interface Module
    This interface indicates that the implementing class is an module. All implementing classes have to provide the default constructor and a constructor providing an instance of StartupContainer
    Author:
    Nelphindal

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      java.util.List<Option> getOptions()

      Executes this module
